content: snowfall town hot water bottle cover by season qian even though i live somewhere it rarely snows i ve always dreamed of a quiet storybook town where snow falls on winter nights that s what inspired this piece whenever i hold this hot water bottle in its hand-knit cover it gives me a gentle comforting sense of warmth and emotional support size needles cover will fit 31 5cm × 20 5cm hot 3 5mm long circular needles water bottle if you want to make it wider or gauge narrower just add or take away 18 stitches to make it longer or shorter 10cm × 10cm = 22 stitches × 25 you can add or
